title: anjAdu mun selvOmE
sahitya:
anjAdu mun selvOmE shuddhAtmA nAn avan avaL aduvenrE


anupallavi

  en jAti un jAti enak-unakkenrE ekkAlum iDar sheyum akkap-pOrinriyE


caraNam    pazhaiya pancAngattin palliyaip-pArAdu pADupaTTup-pizhaippOmE
uzhai podu nalattinAl Ur nalam peravE uNmaiyAi nanmaiyAi tiNmaiyAi vaNmaiyAi
